titleStmt.title: E. D. Townsend, Special Orders, No. 152
CWG11473

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 45th, 47th, 48th, and 49th Regiments Kentucky Infantry Muster Rolls

body.p:
WAR DEPARTMENT,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Washington, March 30th, 1865.

47. So much of Special Orders, No. 147, May 28th, 1864, from Head-quarters, Department of the Ohio, as discharged, on tender of resignation, Captain James H. Phillips, 40th Kentucky Volunteers, is hereby amended so as to read: Assistant Surgeon James H. Phillips.

By order of the Secretary of War:
E. D. Townsend,
Assistant Adjutant General.

OFFICIAL:
E D Townsend
Assistant Adjutant General.

War Department
Adjutant General's office
Washington Mar. 30. 1865
Townsend E. D.
A. A. G.
Order
Amending so much of special Orders No. 147 May 28. 1864 as discharged Capt. J. H. Phillips, so as to read Asst. Surg J. H. Phillips --
Recd A. G. O. Ky 6 April 1865
